title: Admin dashboard UI update: large circular top 3 buttons + full-width bordered group for 3 money buttons

requirements.text: Update the Admin dashboard top summary area to match the uploaded screenshot: render the 3 summary items (Total Work/Total Taken/Total Due) as large circular buttons in a single row that spans the full available screen width, with consistent spacing and clear icon/label/value layout inside each circle.

quotes: এগুলোকে পুরো স্ক্রিন জুড়ে বড় আকারে দেখাতে চান?
এখানে সার্কের  তুমি দিবে  রাউন্ড শেপ

acceptanceCriteria: On the Admin dashboard view, the top 3 summary actions are displayed as circles (not rounded rectangles) using fully round shape styling (e.g., fully-rounded).
The 3 circles appear in one horizontal row and collectively span the available content width (responsive on mobile).
Each circle shows its label and numeric value clearly; existing summary values remain correct (no logic changes to calculations).
The rest of the Admin dashboard layout below the top summary area remains functional and scrolls as before.

requirements.text: Group the next 3 money-related Admin grid buttons (Payment/Loan, Company Report, Final Balance) inside a single full-width bordered container (one border surrounding all three), while keeping the individual button design consistent with the screenshot (same tile look, rounded corners, shadows).

quotes: বাটন (যেগুলো টাকা‑সম্পর্কিত) একসাথে একটি বড় বর্ডারের ভিতরে ফুল‑স্ক্রিন চওড়ায় রাখতে হবে?
আরো পরের তিনটা বাটন ওগুলা একটা বর্ডারের ভিতর থাকবে ফুল স্ক্রিন

acceptanceCriteria: In the Admin dashboard grid menu, the 3 money-related buttons are visually grouped inside one full-width container with a distinct border and rounded corners.
Inside the bordered container, the 3 buttons keep their existing per-button styling (gradient, icon, label, rounded tile shape, shadow) and remain clickable.
Buttons outside this money group (e.g., Production/Work/Nasta and other items) keep the same styling as before and are not unintentionally moved into the border group.

requirements.text: Ensure any UI element intended to be circular in the Admin dashboard (especially the top 3 circles) is perfectly round across devices (no oval distortion), including correct aspect ratio, centered content alignment, and consistent border thickness.

quotes: এখানে সার্কের  তুমি দিবে  রাউন্ড শেপ

acceptanceCriteria: Top circular buttons remain perfectly circular (equal width/height) on common mobile widths.
Borders/shadows around circular buttons appear even and not clipped.
Touch/click targets are preserved and do not overlap the fixed header/footer.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/components/ui/*).
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this UI-only update.
nonGoals: Do not change Admin dashboard navigation behavior or routes beyond necessary layout restructuring.
Do not introduce new authentication methods or third-party integrations.
Do not redesign non-requested pages/sections (Production, Work, Nasta, Payment, etc.) beyond keeping their entry buttons styled as in the screenshot.
